item.description:
Join DCR and the Division of Fisheries and Wildlife

Saturday and Sunday, August 13th-14th, 2011 for a learn to camp weekend!

No prior outdoor experience is necessary, this weekend is especially designed for families new to camping. Activities for the weekend will include instruction in canoeing, fishing, hiking and outdoor cooking skills. There will also be a campfire, night hike, and other outdoor fun

For more info, view this file. (File includes application and full info on scheduled events.)

Preregistration is required by August 5th.

(Not here!-- You have to send in your application form to the address listed.)

The info sheet is available online here.

Call : (508) 389‐6300

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Become an outdoors woman
